alert.note: Alert for Glades; Hendry; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 9:22PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Collier, Hendry, northwestern Palm Beach and southern Glades Counties through 1015 PM EDT... At 922 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fremd Village-Padgett Island to near Immokalee. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Belle Glade, Clewiston, Pahokee, South Bay, Lake Harbor, Montura, Canal Point, Immokalee, Ave Maria, Okeelanta, Belle Glade Camp, Hendry Correctional, Devils Garden, Fremd Village-Padgett Island, Bunker Hill, Harlem and Lake Trafford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Glades; Hendry; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County
